name: no-proxy
description: Determine if a url should bypass a proxy based on NO_PROXY environment variable.
author: Michael J. Ryan <tracker1@gmail.com>

scripts.publish-major: npm version major && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && git push origin master && git push --tags
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && git push origin master && git push --tags
